column3: “I was told this was a good strain to smoke before going to the gym, and I have to agree.  I had he best ever shoulder workout after smoking this.  In between sets I would watch TV and would giggle at sports stars and America's Funniest Home Videos.  I was really easily able to target my deltoids, and especially rear delts, which can be hard for me to do usually.”

“This shit's amazing...it rivals Alaskan Thunderfuck in awesomeness and potency, minus the exhaustion that sets in after a serious ATF sesh.  The smell of the smoke is STRONG and, to my nose, kinda like a cat / skunk piss combo, so I would suggest vaping if you are paranoid about smells traveling.”
“been trying to get my hands on a good sativa for a while now. The search is over :)”

“• With two sativa power parents, it's certainly not unforeseen they produced a 💣child prodigy! 
..tho I AM surprised so many have described the high as relaxing. (I'd def say it's more adderral than xanax! 😉) The very-pungent, harsh flavor +smoke may turnoff some newbies but🔥euphoric-reward surely makes up for it! ✌🏽•”

“Fucking amazing.  VERY potent, and relatively clear-headed and alert high.  I'm in love.  The smoke reeks of cat/skunk piss though, so I would suggest vaping if you're paranoid about smells traveling.”

“I suffer from acute and chronic pain : past history of GI cancer , Sugical intervention , spinal stenosis, and PTSD , GAD and anorexia nervosa (no fancy acronym for that) for these I medicate for. 
Currently my doctors are unable to control the nerves (including pain) in my lower back, which is really painful. And I've been seriously depressed.  I had a small dab of Sour Haze and my depression was gone ! Dab #2 (and ...”

“I was very excited to come across this. Ive had Super Sour Diesel and Super Silver Sour Haze. This may have been better. The buds wreeked of sour amonia and kerosene, and looked dark due to the amber trichs covering the thick purple and forest green nodes. The first hit floored me, it was the strongest diesel flavor i had ever tasted. Piney diesel with a slight sour kerosene twist. The effects also floored me, Shooti...”
“Bought a gram of wax -- and I must say, it's the most uplifting high I've ever gotten. Easy to stay on task and just have an overall happy experience. I'll definitely be buying this strain again!”
“Excellent sativa. Gets me ripped from 2 tokes on a joint and almost no other strain does that. Tastes nice and smooth too!”

“This strain is amazing I gig the Sour D crossed with a Haze that says its unknown but this is energetic, has a long saliva buzz with no anxiety, pain, and anxiety melt away like left out butter while this strain is loved by women for cramps, and if they are unhappy one would love to get them feeling better S they should come first, unless you have a child and you better know and understand children need their mother ...”
“This is one of the best strains that I've smoked... All listed effects work 100% as they should (vaped)...Absolutely Perfect...”
“very good, gave me that energetic feeling:-)”
“Its really strong with a sour strong taste but keeps you smoking, buttt it makes you really tierd on the come down”

“Yes indeed this shit is really good early morning blunt of some sour haze back pain starting to fade fade away watching movies od dry mouth smells wonderful  kind of a sweet aroma a smooth smoke burns my nose a little bit I love it 😍 stopped my nose pretty
Fast”
“Instant high! I personally love how sour the taste is, every strong in fact! Perfect!”
“Pretty good sativa strain. The test is earthy but not in a bad way. A very functional high. I smoke this in a blunt before classes and did fine.”
“Tastes amazing, huge mood lifter too.”
“Pretty good sativa strain. The test is earthy but not in a bad way. A very functional high. I smoke this in a blunt before classes and did fine.”
“Don't threaten me with a good time... This Sativa Is Great, Feel Good, Nice On The Muscle Spasms and Nerve Twitch”
“Definitely felt paranoid for a few minutes but once that wore off I was lifted. Very mellow & definitely had me super creative & helped me stay focused while djing a set. Dry mouth forsure”

“was a good vapor experience... I had major problems with crams in my lower back... I got a vapor cartridge in this sour Haze... was very very good. had it running in my box mod. when I felt a pain full twitch I just hit my pen an bamm. Instant relief... I highly recommend if u want that instant relief. I got a higher watt in my box mod to get me a major hit... an adjustment as I needed. the cartridge was a half gram ...”
“the taste is very citrusy but a clean & nice high”
“Very good strain. The citrus really kicks in. Strong as well!”
“It gets you messed up but also makes you paranoid if you smoke to much also makes you hella tired but overall good strain very sticky trichomes and overall great strain”

“best bud ever......takn off to
 NASA ...”
“Relaxin 'n' Primin”
“Love this strain👌🏾”

“I would give this strain 10 stars if I could.  Some of the best bud I've ever smoked.  Super stony but easy going high, the taste is amazing, even the flowers themselves are beautiful!  If you come across this strain do yourself a favor and try some, it's so worth it!”
“To me, this strain smells slightly minty... It grinds up nicely and provides a strong yet fairly levelheaded high, so it's ideal for daytime smoking when you're planning on getting shit done.”
“Had me in space! Crazy good! Earthy smell and a orange taste. Best I've had so far”
“very relazing. but it hit me like a train so  this strain should be left to experience smokers”
“very easy start to the day with a nice uplifting high. what is important stays in focus. everything else seems to roll off your back. leaves you feeling satisfied your​ life.”
“This strain was pretty good. i didnt had any paranoid. Had lots of dry mouth and felt like my body was numb for pretty long time”
“Awesome strain I love it”
“the taste is very citrusy but a clean & nice high”
“Its strong but always make me sneeze and uncomfortable🙁”
“I can feel the part diesel/part haze. Very relaxing but not sedating for regular smokers. Lessens muscle pain, anxiety. Causes hefty dry mouth.”

“was a good vapor experience... I had major problems with crams in my lower back... I got a vapor cartridge in this sour Haze... was very very good. had it running in my box mod. when I felt a pain full twitch I just hit my pen an bamm. Instant relief... I highly recommend if u want that instant relief. I got a higher watt in my box mod to get me a major hit... an adjustment as I needed. the cartridge was a half gram ...”
“Definitely felt paranoid for a few minutes but once that wore off I was lifted. Very mellow & definitely had me super creative & helped me stay focused while djing a set. Dry mouth forsure”

“Ok, where do I even start...
Like most of the other sativa strains, this one gives you a really, really dry mouth. When I first hit the blunt, I got lowkey dizzy and my head felt a little bit heavier. But after 2-3 min. my surrounding started to feel mich clearer. All the colors started to feel more intense, a very nice feeling. Would definitely recommened this for outdoor.”
“My restless leg syndrome finally to rest! Love this strain!”
“Don't threaten me with a good time... This Sativa Is Great, Feel Good, Nice On The Muscle Spasms and Nerve Twitch”

“The very first thing I notice every time is the incredible taste; which isn't something I normally pay too much attention to.  It's fantastic! 

This is a great strain for day time use, particularly before exercising or locking yourself down with a project.  Super motivating and full of focus, even with the heavy head high you get, you're still getting shit done.  

In closing, this is what a Sativa should be all abo...”

“Not sure if it was because of the quality I got from the dispensary or if it wasn't my thing but the strain was average. I love a good head high which I expected but it wasn't near that. Felt great overall but just didn't live up to the expectations I've heard about the strain. I'd give it another chance though being I'm not sure if it was the strain or my resources.”

“At a cheap price I believe this is one of the better if not the best herb that you can get. It gave me a very positive and uplifting high. I took off one star only because it left me with some dry mouth.”
“it was good..gives me distraction that i need..yeah feels good when weed don't let you concentrate on one stuff..with sour haze you just need to chill and chill”
“It gets you messed up but also makes you paranoid if you smoke to much also makes you hella tired but overall good strain very sticky trichomes and overall great strain”
“Very good strain. The citrus really kicks in. Strong as well!”
“Excellent source of herb.”
“great strain, mostly haze high but definitely a bit of indica feel! minus one star because i felt a bit nervous at a few points of the trip.”
“easily one of the greatest strains I've ever had the pleasure of smoking”
“best strain i've ever had hands up! i had it for the entire past summer all day everyday and i just wanna say i LOVE IT!”
“It's great”

“People forget that different strains effect people differently. SHZ is a sativa strain and is not 'usually' going to give you the head" high. A lot of reviews here mention they wanted a more heady high. If that's the case
column4: you're going to want to go go for an Indica dominant hybrid or a straight up Indica. personally
column5: I like using this gor work at the computer. I do web design and marketing and this gets my creative...”"
